title: ReactJS Developer Intern
description:
YMGrad is looking for a React.js Developer Intern to join our team in New Delhi. As an intern, you will assist in developing and optimizing our web platform, with an emphasis on creating dynamic and responsive user interfaces.
Working days: Monday to Saturday
Working hours: 09:00 AM - 06:00 PM.

*Please apply only if you can commute to the office every day, as this is an in-office internship.

The selected intern's daily responsibilities include:

Collaborating with the team to understand project requirements and contributing to the design and implementation of new features.
Writing code and implementing assigned tasks under the guidance of senior developers.
Conducting thorough testing of the application to identify and report any issues or bugs.
Participating in code reviews and learning from the feedback provided by senior developers.

Job Type: Internship
Contract length: 4 months

Pay: ₹8,000.00 - ₹10,000.00 per month

Work Location: In person

title: MERN Full Stack Intern
description:
Key Responsibilities:

Assist in developing web and mobile applications with frontend and backend technologies
Collaborate with the development team to design, code, and test software solutions
Support the creation of responsive and visually appealing UI/UX
Help develop and manage databases and APIs
Participate in troubleshooting, debugging, and improving software performance
Work on security and data protection features
Document technical processes and contribute to project discussions

Requirements:

Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, IT, or a related field
Basic knowledge of frontend technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
Familiarity with JS/NodeJS frameworks (ReactJS, ExpressJS, NextJS, etc.)
Understanding of Relational Databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL)
Knowledge of REST APIs and backend development concepts
Strong problem-solving skills and a passion for learning new technologies
Good communication and teamwork skills

Job Type: Internship
Contract length: 3 months

Pay: ₹25,000.00 - ₹35,000.00 per month

Work Location: In person

title: Software Engineer Trainee
description:
About TechCrumb

TechCrumb is a digital transformation and product engineering startup. We are building up some revolutionary video-tech products. We design and build highly scalable digital platforms with Cloud and Data engineering at the focal point by working on the latest generation of cutting-edge technologies.

Job Description
The job description incorporates current industry demands for GenAI developers, including experience with frameworks like LangChain,, understanding of prompt engineering, and knowledge of AI ethics and responsible deployment.

Technical Focus Areas:

Generative AI Development: Working with LLMs, RAG systems, prompt engineering, and AI model integration
Coding Skills: At least one of - Python or Javascript (NodeJS)
Problem-Solving Excellence: Emphasis on analytical thinking, algorithm design, and complex technical challenge resolution

Responsibilities Include:

Building production-ready AI applications using state-of-the-art foundation models
Developing RAG systems and vector database implementations
Creating scalable web applications and APIs
Implementing MLOps pipelines and AI system optimization
Collaborating across teams to translate business needs into technical solutions

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: ₹8,000.00 - ₹15,000.00 per month

Benefits:

Health insurance

Education:

Bachelor's (Preferred)

Experience:

Python: 1 year (Preferred)
JavaScript: 1 year (Preferred)

Location:

Delhi, Delhi (Preferred)

Work Location: In person

title: MEAN Stack Developer Trainee
type: New Delhi South Ext-II, Delhi, Delhi
description:
Edufied offers a Work From Home opportunity for interns to work closely with the development team and discover a new way to create business Products as part of their Software Development Environment.

Requirements:

The ideal candidate should possess: [Must haves]

- Javascript Knowledge
- Git
- Ability to work with a team
- Capable of taking initiative on specific projects
- Good logical skill
- A positive and flexible attitude
- Graduating students are preferred

Good to have:

- Basic understanding of front-end technologies and platforms, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
- Good understanding of server-side CSS preprocessors, such as LESS and SASS
- Understanding accessibility and security compliance
- User authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments
- Integration of multiple data sources and databases into one system
- Management of hosting environment, including database administration and scaling an application to support load changes
- Data migration, transformation, and scripting
- Setup and administration of backups
- Outputting data in different formats
- Understanding differences between multiple delivery platforms such as mobile vs desktop, and optimizing output to match the specific platform
- Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes
- Implementing automated testing platforms and unit tests
- Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
- Proficient understanding of OWASP security principles
- Understanding of - session management- in a distributed server environment

Benefits:

Remote, work from home
Tamperproof Certificate of Completion
Full time job opportunity for top performer
Completion Bonus

Job Type: Internship
Contract length: 6 months

Benefits:

Flexible schedule
Work from home

Application Question(s):

How many hours are you available per week for this internship? (Can be 30 -40 hours/week)
What is your preferred working schedule (days and times of day in Singapore Time, SGT GMT +8)?
Are you open to a 4 to 6 months internship?
How long before you will graduate?
Are you open to a Full-time position after this internship? This is a remote, work-from-home setting.

title: Software Engineering Intern
description:
Software Engineering Intern

Duration: 3 months

Work Mode : Remote





Google Form : https://forms.gle/TwziDB9MVfyxHHFd9

Please fill this form , it is mandatory.


What We’re Looking For

Strong grasp of JavaScript fundamentals
Some experience with TypeScript (even a personal project)
Ability to write basic SQL queries (select, insert, joins, etc.)
Familiarity with REST APIs and HTTP basics
Bonus: experience with Next.js, Jest, or any AWS services


What You’ll Work On

· Building APIs and serverless functions using TypeScript + Node.js

Writing MySQL queries and understanding DB schema design
Occasionally contributing to the frontend in Next.js
Integration with third-party fintech APIs (Razorpay, MF, shares, etc.)
Writing unit tests for critical modules
Learning how a real fintech startup operates and scales backend systems


Prerequisites

A GitHub portfolio or link to 1–2 projects you've worked on
Eagerness to learn fast and build real features
Willingness to take ownership and debug like a detective
